title: [GAMEPLAY] Can't use skills on game launch
body:
My apologies for posting this on the wrong board if I have done so: I tried posting directly to the support forum and it said I had to be level 7 or higher to post, which is some serious backhand insult because my silver 2 skills aren't that bad.

Sometimes (with positive probability around 0.07), when a game starts and I load in, I can level up skills with ctrl-qwe just fine, but when I hit the skill (or b, d, f, or p for that matter) the game does nothing. DC-ing and reconnecting to the game fixes the bug with some positive probability around 0.75, but sometimes it does not and I have to re-client mid-game, which fixes it with some other positive probability.

I'd post a screenshot or a clip of the game from the client but that would just contain a jinx not using her skills.

This _only_ happens on my laptop: I switched computers for a couple weeks and never got the bug, and I hopped back on this one and I started having it again. It's been a problem for a couple years now, and only now have I been not-lazy enough to report it.

replies.body:
it sounds like your laptop might not be grabbing the server side config settings for some reason. I want to have you try refreshing those really quickly, but keep in mind this is going to refresh *all* of those config settings back to default. 

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings

All right, doing so reset stuff like login music and deleted my old item sets (thank god, they're so out of date), so I'm assuming that I did the steps correctly. If I have any more issues I'll post here again. Thanks for the help!
